name: WordLearner (TibiSoft)
description:
It has been created as a simple personal project for my kids to ask the words of actual lessons in any language.

Create Lessons:

Just open an empty *.txt file, use 3 comma sparated words in one line, like
Word1,Word2,Comment,
and save it. No space between.

The file can be loaded to the tool, set the max number of questions and kick it off.

Word1 will be asked, Word2 should be the answer, comment is optional. If no comment, you can put:
Word1,Word2,,

Proto version functions and issues:
- To ask the word from different 'direction', Word1 and Word2 can be 'exchanged', by clicking on a Hungarian flag at bottom-down corner. 

- At the main menu you can scroll the 'database' by up and down arrows

- To change the number of questions at main menu you can also use right click on blue arrow (+10 and -10)

- There are no fool-proof solutions, in case of not correct format of file a random Error can be occurred.

- During the test you should just type the word in end press ENTER. You are also able to delete by BACKSPACE. No other eding function is available yet.

- There is one sample file (Hungarian-Italian) included

- Italian and UK flags are only for decoration purpose for my kids :)
